C

checkReservation() - Static method in class Presentation.ReservationUI
This function display the list of reservation information.
checkReservationBooking(Reservation, int) - Method in class Business.ReservationManager
This function checks if the reservation has expired pass the allowed timing.
checkTableAvailability() - Static method in class Presentation.TableUI
This function displays a list of tables status, "Occupied" means there is an order for the table and "Reserved" means that there is a reservation made for that table.
closeOrder(Order) - Method in class Business.OrderManager
This functions updates an order that is closed.
createCustomer(Customer) - Method in class Business.CustomerManager
This function creates the customer data.
createMenuItem(Item) - Method in class Business.ItemManager
This function verifies the input before creating the item.
createMenuItem() - Static method in class Presentation.ItemUI
This function ask the user to input the item name, type, price and description that the user wishes to create.
createOrder(Order) - Method in class Business.OrderManager
This function verifies if the order to be created does not overwrites the previous order to the table.
createOrder(Staff) - Static method in class Presentation.OrderUI
This function ask user to select a table to create an order.
createOrderedItem(OrderedItem) - Method in class Business.OrderedItemManager
This function creates the ordered item.
createOrderedPackage(OrderedPackage) - Method in class Business.OrderedPackageManager
This function creates the ordered package
createPackage(PromotionalPackage) - Method in class Business.PackageManager
This function verifies the input before creating the promotional package.
createPackage() - Static method in class Presentation.PromotionalPackageUI
This function retrieves a list of items for the user to select from in order to add it into the promotional package.
createPackageItem(PackageItem) - Method in class Business.PackageItemManager
This function creates the package item.
createReservation() - Static method in class Presentation.ReservationUI
This function ask user to input the customer's information.
createReservationBooking(Reservation, int) - Method in class Business.ReservationManager
This function verifies the user input to ensure that the restaurant is able to accommodate the expected number of people.
Customer - Class in Data
This class implements the Customer entity with the attributes id, name, contactNumber, Reservation.
